RelatedSentence: As WCBS 880's Marla Diamond reported , to mark the anniversary of the invention of the iconic 1980 s toy , Liberty Science Center in Jersey City has opened a Beyond Rubik 's Cube exhibit , which shows visitors the cube from concept to worldwide phenomenon .
The exhibit includes a robot that solves the Rubik 's Cube in one minute - and does a victory dance afterward .
The exhibit includes a robot that solves the Rubik 's Cube in one minute - and does a victory dance afterward .
It also includes a Solve Bar , which photographs the cubes of players and then shows them how to solve them .

Matthew Gold , a child of the '80 s , said he was never able to solve the Rubik 's Cube .
